page.title: 20SPREYTON SCHOOL D. PROJECT
page.content: There are 32 children at Spreyton School.We come here when we are 5 years old and leave when we are 11 years old.Because we are a village school and our Mums and Dads and all the people around help us a lot,we asked them to join in with our Domesday Project. All of us helped to do the Project and we organised it as our theme,just like the other themes we wrote about on pages 9 and 10. When we had finished our Project we had an exhibition to show the village our work.We had to tell our visitors all about it,like a guide showing people round a castle and we served coffee and we made Domesday house and Domesday people biscuits.It was great fun.
